name: squadbox
description: AI-powered web application builder - Vite React Project

scripts.vercel-build: echo 'Building Vite React project' && vite build
scripts.build:production: echo '🚀 Production build with optimizations' && npx vite build --mode production
scripts.build:staging: echo '🔧 Staging build with debug info' && vite build --mode staging
scripts.build:development: echo '🛠️ Development build with source maps' && vite build --mode development
scripts.build:preview: echo '👀 Preview build for testing' && vite build --mode preview
scripts.build:feature: echo '✨ Feature branch build' && vite build --mode feature
scripts.build:hotfix: echo '🚨 Hotfix build with emergency fixes' && vite build --mode hotfix
scripts.build:release: echo '📋 Release candidate build' && vite build --mode release
